extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableColumnAdjuster(javax.swing.JTable table)
      Constructor to set default width of columns with default spacing of 6.
      TableColumnAdjuster(javax.swing.JTable table, int spacing)
      An overloaded constructor that you can use to customize the spacing between columns - when adjusting column widths.
